nodes.bodyText: Instead of commenting can we remove those lines ? We can add a TODO to point to the commit which has these changes ?
You can remove assertEventually(new Duration(5, SECONDS), operatorStatsSupplier::get); altogether
I am indeed planning on bringing this back using the assertQueryStats thing we added recently. But I wanted to wait for the in-progress iceberg DF PR to merge which has changes in these files.
